options.name: Talented Musician
options.description: Learn a Ballad and gain +1 Performance

options.name: Songsmith
options.description: Learn a Ballad and gain +2 Range on your Ballads

options.name: Reaction : Bridge
options.description: While Focusing on a Ballad, you can mix in another Ballad as a Reaction that only lasts until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Reaction : Parody
options.description: When an Attack misses you or an Ally within your Ballad Range, you can use your Reaction to sing or play a quick parody about that Creature, causing them to have a 1d4 Penalty on their next Attack or Defense Check.

options.name: Mantle of the Minstrel
options.description: Creatures that can hear your Ballads cannot be Confused or Maddened. Additionally, affected Creatures do not fall Unconscious until reaching 1 Lifeline Point.
